pullRequest.title: [FLINK-18394][docs-zh] Translate "Parquet Format" page into Chinese
pullRequest.bodyText:
What is the purpose of the change
Translate "Parquet Format" page into Chinese.
The page url is https://ci.apache.org/projects/flink/flink-docs-master/zh/dev/table/connectors/formats/parquet.html
The markdown file is located in flink/docs/dev/table/connectors/formats/parquet.zh.md
Brief change log

Translate flink/docs/dev/table/connectors/formats/parquet.zh.md.

Verifying this change
This change is a trivial rework / code cleanup without any test coverage.
Does this pull request potentially affect one of the following parts:

Dependencies (does it add or upgrade a dependency): no
The public API, i.e., is any changed class annotated with @Public(Evolving): no
The serializers: no
The runtime per-record code paths (performance sensitive): no
Anything that affects deployment or recovery: JobManager (and its components), Checkpointing, Kubernetes/Yarn/Mesos, ZooKeeper: no
The S3 file system connector: no

Documentation

Does this pull request introduce a new feature? no
If yes, how is the feature documented? no

nodes.bodyText: 暂不支持复合数据类型（Array、Map 与 Row）
nodes.diffHunk: @@ -186,4 +185,4 @@ The following table lists the type mapping from Flink type to Parquet type. -Attention Composite data type: Array, Map and Row are not supported. +注意 复合数据类型（Array、Map 与 Row）不被支持。

commit.message: address the review suggestion that parquet format can be consistent with json Chinese page
address the review suggestion that key words of parquet format can be consistent with json Chinese page
